title: universal_binaries break building when replace is true
body:
### What happened?

Hello!

I believe that having `universal_binaries/replace: true ` while using `--output` flag in build command results in an ugly out of index error.

```
./bin/goreleaser build --clean --snapshot --single-target --output .
  • starting build...

  • setting defaults
      • DEPRECATED: `archives.rlcp` will be the default soon, check https://goreleaser.com/deprecations#archivesrlcp for more info

```

When I disable the replace option and run build again it succeeds . 

### How can we reproduce this?

Please visit https://github.com/saucelabs/forwarder. 

The goreleaser config is here: https://github.com/saucelabs/forwarder/blob/main/.goreleaser.yml

Steps to reproduce: 
1. `git clone git@github.com:saucelabs/forwarder.git`
2. `cd forwarder`
3. `make install-dependencies` or manually install goreleaser in the right version 
4. `make build` or `./bin/goreleaser build --clean --snapshot --single-target --output .`
5. See the error

### goreleaser version

```bash
goreleaser version dev

goarch: arm64
```
